President Donald Trump said Monday that his top economic adviser , Larry Kudlow , suffered a heart attack . [ARG0: Trump] [V: tweeted] [ARGM-DIR: from Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: just minutes before his historic meeting with North Korean leader Kim] ...
